# Hanoman
[![License: GPL v3](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-GPLv3-blue.svg)](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0)
[![PyPI status](https://img.shields.io/pypi/status/ansicolortags.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/ansicolortags/)
[![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/ansicolortags/badge/?version=latest)](http://ansicolortags.readthedocs.io/?badge=latest)
![Safe](https://img.shields.io/badge/Stay-Safe-red?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)

### Anti-Malware Engine 


<p align="center">
<img width="350" src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44236850/116784675-c7a6b980-aabf-11eb-8fd8-78dfa6a03dd7.png "</a>
</p>

<b>Hanoman</b> is an antivirus designed for detecting polymorphic virus and disinfecting it.

---

### Features & To Do
- [ ] GUI scanner
- [x] Milter interface for sendmail 
- [x] Advanced database updater with support for scripted updates and digital signatures
- [x] Virus database updated multiple times per day
- [x] Built-in support for all standard mail file formats
- [x] Built-in support for various archive formats, including Zip, RAR, Dmg, Tar, Gzip, Bzip2, OLE2, Cabinet, CHM, BinHex, SIS and others
